summary: Gaming app where users can play games by placing bets and win money
architectural_notes: Real money gaming platform requiring payment integration
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Bold, energetic logo for Humbo Bumbo gaming platform with playful typography and vibrant colors (humbo-bumbo-logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Exciting game background with dynamic patterns and bright colors suggesting competition and winning (game-background.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Implement a game selection interface showing available games with entry fees and potential winnings
Build a betting system where users can place bets from their wallet balance before starting a game
Create at least one playable game mechanic with win/lose conditions
Implement win/loss resolution that credits winnings to user wallet on victory or records loss
Build a game history view showing past games played with bet amounts, outcomes, and winnings
Design a vibrant, exciting gaming interface with a creative visual theme featuring energetic colors, bold typography, and engaging layouts that evoke the thrill of competitive gaming and winning
Render generated logo and game background images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated

new_feature_requests.summary: Gaming platform with real money betting and winnings
Create a user wallet system that tracks user balance in the backend with deposit and withdrawal functionality
